alert.note: Alert for Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 27 at 3:10AM MST until February 28 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 9 inches in the Big Hole and Centennial Mountains, 9 to 13 inches in mountain passes, and 15 to 23 inches on ridge tops and elevations above passes in the Bear River Range. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Bear River Range, Big Hole Mountains and the Island Park area including the cities of Emigration Summit, Victor, Island Park, and Kilgore. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bear River Range; Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
